template <dimension_type Dim = 1, typename T = 1, typename LP = 1, typename Map = 1>
class vsip::impl::Fast_block_impl
File: ../../../vsip/core/fast_block.hpp

Implementation class for Fast_block.

Fast_block_impl implements a multi-dimiensional block that is adapted by Fast_block specializations for each dimension.

Template parameters:
Dim:to be block dimension,
T:to be a value type,
LP:to be the block layout policy, encapsulating dimension-ordering, packing format, and complex format,
Map:to be a map type.
